# deps/chromium/base/memory

set(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR "${CHROMIUM_BASE_DIR}/memory")

file(GLOB CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_HEADERS "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*.cc")

# Remove sources for other platform or unit test:
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*_unittest.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*_mac.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*_win.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*_nacl.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*_android.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*_chromeos.cc")
remove_file(CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES GLOB "${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_DIR}/*_fuchsia.cc")

list(APPEND CHROMIUM_BASE_HEADERS ${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_HEADERS})
list(APPEND CHROMIUM_BASE_SOURCES ${CHROMIUM_BASE_MEMORY_SOURCES})

set(CHROMIUM_BASE_HEADERS ${CHROMIUM_BASE_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(CHROMIUM_BASE_SOURCES ${CHROMIUM_BASE_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
